title: ONS crisis deepens as it admits retail sales data issue; UK house prices ‘at record’ high – business live
summary: The Office for National Statistics announced it miscalculated the seasonally adjusted retail sales data. This miscalculation highlights potential inaccuracies in reporting on economic performance. The correction may impact analyses and forecasts related to consumer spending.

title: Hollow Knight: Silksong launch crashes online gaming stores
summary: On Friday, major digital storefronts including Steam, the Nintendo eShop, and the Playstation Store experienced significant outages. The crashes were attributed to overwhelming demand for an Australian-made game. Users faced difficulties accessing and purchasing the game due to the disruption.

title: Average UK house price reaches record £299,331, says Halifax
summary: In August, prices rose by 0.3%, marking the third consecutive monthly increase. This figure surpassed market expectations. The trend suggests ongoing inflationary pressures in the economy.

title: Rope hope: meet the 72-year-old heaving hard for England’s tug of war team
summary: Richard Keightley, a lifelong puller, is set to compete in the world championships in Nottingham this weekend. He recently contributed to Great Britain's gold medal victory at the World Games last month. Keightley's participation highlights his ongoing commitment to the sport.
